attributes.action: Hold a referendum on ID cards and the National Identity Register
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In view of the government's inability to protect our privacy, in particular by losing our personal details on a regular basis, we must hold a referendum on the introduction of Identity Cardfs and the National Identity Register.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Hold a referendum on ID cards and the National Identity Register"

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page18053


Prime Minister's Office
